project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A comprehensive portal to improve customer onboarding, self-service, and success metrics.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to securely log in using their main SaaS product credentials.
acceptance_criteria: Users can log in with their existing credentials
Secure session management and token handling

feature_breakdown.description: Display a personalized onboarding checklist based on the customer's subscription level.
acceptance_criteria: Checklists are accurately generated based on subscription tier

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to allow seamless content searching and viewing.
acceptance_criteria: Users can search and view knowledge base articles within the portal
Seamless integration with the existing knowledge base

feature_breakdown.description: Display a dashboard showing the customer's adoption metrics (e.g., daily active users, feature usage count).
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard provides a clear overview of key adoption metrics

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or a Zendesk ticket with customer details.
acceptance_criteria: Users can easily initiate contact with their CSM
Relevant customer details are automatically included

technical_architecture.data_flow: Users access the COSP web application, which communicates with the API gateway. The gateway routes requests to the appropriate microservices, which in turn interact with the database, message queue, and external integrations as needed. Data is processed and returned to the web application for display.
security_considerations: Implement OAuth 2.0 and SAML for secure authentication and authorization
Use industry-standard encryption (TLS 1.2+) for all network communications
Implement role-based access control (RBAC) to restrict user permissions
Regularly audit and patch all system components to address security vulnerabilities

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the minimum viable product within 6 months.
Implement the adoption metrics dashboard and reporting.
Integrate the 'Contact CSM' feature to improve customer support.

risk_analysis.description: Delays in integrating with the existing identity provider and CRM system.
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Engage with stakeholders early, establish clear integration requirements and timelines.

risk_analysis.description: Difficulty in designing and implementing the personalized onboarding checklists.
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Allocate sufficient time for user research, prototyping, and iterative development.

risk_analysis.description: Challenges in processing and visualizing the customer usage data in real-time.
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Carefully plan the data architecture and leverage appropriate technologies for scalable data processing and visualization.

risk_analysis.description: Inability to meet the performance and scalability requirements.
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Implement a microservices-based architecture with load balancing and caching mechanisms. Conduct performance testing and capacity planning.

risk_analysis.description: Budget constraints and the need to deliver the MVP within 6 months.
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Prioritize features based on business impact, optimize development processes, and explore cost-effective solutions.

tools_and_technologies: AWS (EC2, RDS, EKS, Lambda, API Gateway)
infrastructure_needs: Scalable cloud-based infrastructure (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP)
Secure network architecture with load balancing and firewalls

success_metrics.target_value: Decrease by 5 percentage points within 12 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Monthly analysis of customer retention and cancellation data

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce from 30 days to 14 days within 6 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Tracking the time between customer onboarding and first feature adoption

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce time spent on manual onboarding tasks by 25%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Monitoring CSM productivity and time allocation

success_metrics.target_value: Increase to 40% of support questions resolved via the portal
success_metrics.measurement_method: Analyzing the ratio of portal-based to ticket-based support interactions
